every day Modi would see thousands of

the streets and the beach and he became

created an association called clean
Senegal to raise awareness for the
plastic problem he dresses himself up in
a makeshift costume full of plastic bags
plastic cups plastic straws etc as a
statement for people to take action and

noticeable in the streets
